Hero.hello: I have 5 years of experience as a coding enthusiast and 3 years as a professional developer working mostly with Angular.

Responsibilities.title: Responsibilities
Responsibilities.point1: Create and adjust UIs based on Figma prototypes.
Responsibilities.point5: Develop and maintain 5+ Angular web applications, ensuring high performance, responsiveness and good user experience through regular usability testing and feedback incorporation.
Responsibilities.point6: Conceptualize and implement reusable Angular libraries to streamline development and centralize maintenance.
Responsibilities.point7: Explore and integrate new technologies and methodologies to enhance user experience.

Achievements.title: Key Results
Achievements.point1: Designed and developed 6 reusable Angular libraries, reducing development time by 60% and centralizing maintenance, resulting in a more efficient workflow across 10+ projects.
Achievements.point2: Developed a dynamic dashboard web application similar to Microsoft Power BI, enabling users to create custom dashboards with flexible features for presenting data integrated from public entities like CADASTUR and IBGE.
Achievements.point3: Enhanced the UI/UX of an advanced table component with filtering, aggregation, and sorting functionalities, improving data access efficiency and user satisfaction.
